hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Ali said:“I made some food and called the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) (to come and eat). He came and saw some images in the house, so he went back.”

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا رَأَى الضَّيْفُ مُنْكَرًا رَجَعَ
chapter.eng-name: If a guest sees something bad, he should go back
